name: Don’t Starve: Newhome
description: Don’t Starve: Newhome brings a new Don’t Starve adventure to your phone! Craft, survive, and explore with your friends! A mysterious new survival adventure is on the way! The new mobile game, developed by Shengqu Games, will expand on the core survival, exploration, and crafting gameplay that Don’t Starve is known for while introducing social and multiplayer elements that expand gameplay in exciting new ways.
